item.title: FUDCon 2011: Day One
item.description: The first day of FUDCon 2011 in Tempe is coming to a close tonight and I’m completely exhausted.

item.title: Gearing up for FUDCon 2011
item.description: FUDCon 2011 in Tempe hasn’t even fully started yet, but it’s been well worth the trip already.
